name: Nth-Of-Type
description: The `:nth-of-type()` pseudo-class behaves like [`:nth-child`](https://css4-selectors.com/selector/css3/structural-pseudo-class/#nth-child-class 'CSS3: Structural pseudo class') but with the difference that only elements with the same element name will be selected.
example_description:
This example will select every odd only `

` element and set a gray background.
